betterquesting:10.desc:8:
So you want to control more complex machine setus where the Diesel Genrator is not next to the machine such with electrolyzers which have a dynamo betwen the generator and the electrolyzer.  You can use a Restone Machine Switch to start and stop the generator with a redstone signal. This cover will at least cover the generator.
§b
Tip:  You can start out using a switch to start and stop the Diesel Generator but once you get Tier 2 Circuits, you can fully automate the start and stop of the Diesel Generator when the machine has enough to run by adding a Activity Sensor (Possible).  You will also need a set of restone receive/transmit covers also to transmit the redstoen signal through the dynamo or other intmediate machines.
§b§a
To ocmplete this quest craft:
1 Redstone Machine Switch
